title: Exponential Regression on a Scatterplot
question_text: If the data in a scatterplot appears to be exponential form, the best way to transform the data into linear form is to

choices.text: Plot the log of the values of the independent variable ( x x ) against the dependent variable ( y y ).
Plot the values of the independent variable ( x x ) against the log of the values of the dependent variable ( y y ).
Plot the log of the values of the independent variable ( x x ) against the log of the values of the dependent variable ( y y ).
Plot the values of the independent variable ( x x ) against the square root of the values of the dependent variable ( y y ).
Plot the values of the independent variable ( x x ) against the reciprocal of the values of the dependent variable ( y y ).
